<TouchableOpacity\r\n onPress={:
<TouchableOpacity
          onPress={() =>setShowConfirmPassword(!showConfirmPassword)}> <Image

건강증진, 예방, 만성질환 등: Health promotion, prevention, chronic diseases, etc.
감기, 소화기, 호흡기 등: Cold, digestive system, respiratory system, etc.
소변시 통증, 남성 질환 등: Pain during urination, male diseases, etc.
소아호흡기, 소아소화기, 알레르기 등: Pediatric respiratory, pediatric digestive, allergy, etc.
요통, 디스크, 신경질환 등: Back pain, disc, nerve diseases, etc.
신체 회복, 물리 치료, 만성통증 등: Physical recovery, physiotherapy, chronic pain, etc.
치아치료, 외과질환, 턱관절 등: Dental treatment, oral surgery, temporomandibular joint, etc.
한의원 진료, 다이어트, 침술 등: Oriental clinic treatment, diet, acupuncture, etc.
심장질환, 혈관질환, 폐질환 등: Heart disease, vascular disease, lung disease, etc.
